value:
$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|Whew... Looks like I finally got away
from my brother.$k$pI just want to enjoy the spring
festival without him ruining
everything for me.$k$pNow... Let's see how the people like
my bunny outfit!$k$p...I hope leaving him behind doesn't
come back to bite me somehow.$k$pDoes he have any friends he can
enjoy the festival with? Hmm...$k$pI almost feel bad for him spending
his festival time all dressed up,
surrounded by strangers...$k$p

$WmMPID_ジーク,ch10_31_Zeke_M_Normal,Face|That spring look fits you well,
I must say.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|Y-you really think so?$k$p$WmMPID_カナス,ch03_18_Canas_M_Normal,Face|I agree. It highlights all your
best features.$k$pYou should consider dressing
like this more often!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|Umm... Who are these people?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|Ah, there you are, Delthea!
These are...friends I've made
since arriving in Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|You? Made friends?!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|I did. It has been nice to have
people to share things with.$k$pI have learned so much from them—
so much I would never have learned
doing my research in solitude.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|Oh... Well... Then, good.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|We were about to explore the festival
a bit, so if you want to join us, it's
perfect timing.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|H-huh? I— N-no, thanks.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|Well, I can't just leave you. Not after
all the trouble you caused...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|Don't worry about me! I'll be good!
Go with your friends, and I'll...$k$pSee you later!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭リュート,ch10_29_Lute_M_SpringFes22,Face|Hey! ...Delthea!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_春祭デューテ,ch10_04_Dyute_F_SpringFes22,Face|$Fi1500|Whew! ...Well, that was unexpected.
I guess he has friends now... Weird.
People can change after all.$k$pSeems like being summoned here
has done him some good... That's
something to be happy about.$k$p...Although, maybe a little sad too?$k$pNah, that can't be right! Hahaha...$k$pAnd now that he's out of the way...
I wonder if I can find any dashing
rabbits around here!$k$p
